title: Understanding Table Naming
text: When you name a table in a spreadsheet application, it allows you to refer to the table by its name in various functions and formulas. This can make your formulas easier to read and manage.

title: Using Named Tables in Functions
text: Named tables can be used in functions to make your formulas more intuitive. For example, instead of using cell references like A1:B10, you can use the table name directly in your formula.

title: Can Named Tables Be Used in Functions?
text: Consider whether naming a table allows you to use that name in functions like SUM, AVERAGE, etc.
